text: Lidia Lupu (19 May 1953 – 13 November 2021) was a Moldovan politician. She is a member of the Party of Socialists of the Republic of Moldova. She was in the Parliament of the Republic of Moldova from 2014 to 2019. Lupu was born in Chișinău, Moldova. Lupu died on 13 November 2021 in Chișinău at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Moldovan politicians
title: Lidia Lupu
